text: Thailand collected nationality data for its provinces in both 1970 and 2000. They also collected religion and language data for the provinces in both 1990 and 2000. The table below shows Thai provincial data about these things for these specific Thai census years. ==Data== Nationality data by Thai province for 1970 and 2000 and religion and language data by Thai
